column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: interet. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: @prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix ont: <http://example.org/ontology#> .ont:Interest rdf:type rdfs:Class .ont:hasInterest rdf:type rdf:Property ;    rdfs:label "has interest" ;    rdfs:domain ont:Person ;    rdfs:range ont:Interest .ont:Person rdf:type rdfs:Class .ont:Music rdf:type ont:Interest .ont:Sports rdf:type ont:Interest .ont:Art rdf:type ont:Interest .ont:Computer rdf:type ont:Interest .ont:Reading rdf:type ont:Interest .ont:John rdf:type ont:Person ;    ont:hasInterest ont:Music .ont:Amy rdf:type ont:Person ;    ont:hasInterest ont:Art ;    ont:hasInterest ont:Reading .ont:Mike rdf:type ont:Person ;    ont:hasInterest ont:Computer .ont:Dave rdf:type ont:Person ;    ont:hasInterest ont:Sports ;    ont:hasInterest ont:Computer .
